Cognitive Service

Understand the service of future

Further services

  • Process Automation
  • Smart Metadata
Got any questions?
Call us today!
+49 331 27970730
hello@zaibr.com

What are cognitive services?

They are a compilation of machine learning algorithms that are developed by different companies to solve the problems that often occur in the field of Artificial intelligence. All the cognitive services aim at making Arterial intelligence accessible by packaging it into distinct components that are easy for software developers to use in their apps. Cognitive services are based on an advanced and comprehensive set of tools and framework that allows businesses to operationalize artificial intelligence services quickly without needing any data scientist. At a deep level in addition to artificial intelligence, the cognitive services also comprise things such as Machine learning (ML), Natural language processing (NLP) and Human-computer interaction (HCI), and a host of other things. Web developers can use these algorithms through standard representational state transfer calls all over the internet to the Cognitive services application programming interface (API)

What can we do by using cognitive services?

With the cognitive services, you can step into the fastest and ever-growing collection of powerful algorithms that are developed and designed by experts in particular fields including computer vision, speech, text analytics, face, emotion, language understanding intelligent service (LUIS), and web language model application programming interface (APIs). All sorts of cognitive services are mainly used to simplify and make easy a huge variety of tasks based on artificial intelligence. It gives you a very quick method to extract insights from the data and boost your analytic capability. Cognitive services blend into whatever language and platform you prefer. This includes bespoke applications. They function to enhance your analytical ability.

What sort of cognitive services are available?

There are five major types of popular cognitive services that help in business growth. These services are vision, speech, search, language, and knowledge. A brief explanation of these services is below in this article.

Vision services:

The first category that will be discussed here is vision. This one is more related to an application that can identify and analyze the content within videos and images. Some well-known software developers are among the leaders in developing new technologies in artificial intelligence and machine learning, it provides the users with vision-based services that have been expanded to accommodate the needs. The vision services include image analysis, this feature allows its user to go through and classify many types of visual elements found in a picture. This feature can help you identify the faces in your picture, it tells you dimensions, format, and if it’s adult content or not. It even identifies the prominent colors used in the background of the image. The vision services can also recognize handwriting. This smart tool can detect, extract and digitally reproduce any type of handwriting you want. In addition to this, the vision services can also read the text in images. The service is efficient enough to detect all sorts of English text in an image and change it into a stream of characters that can be read by the machine. The tool also helps you in stripping a video, frame-by-frame and also gives a text-based description of each frame

Speech services

The second service is speech service. Including speech recognition software in your workflow requires some struggle. The benefit offered by AI-based speech services is that they are very much accurate and efficient as compared to the non-Ai counterparts. Nowadays everything is very advanced and matches the ability of a human being to identify the spoken word. Speech recognition and speech-to-text transcripts is an important service that recognizes and transcribes the text accurately regardless of the speech style, geography, or technical terms. In addition to this by using the advanced acoustic models, the speech services offered, will help you in reading out loud. The service is capable of translating any text with unparalleled accuracy, no matter what the language is. So forget using Google translate or any other translation software.  A brand new service is added to speech that allows you to train and tune the speech service, to permit the background accents, background noise, and vocabulary. The capacity to train a model to identify the spoken word efficiently is the key to enhancing the accuracy of recognition

Language

Along with speech service language service is also offered. The language service is continuously updated with new words and slang. The language service includes text analytics tools that can detect a positive or negative sentiment and also detects the language being used. It can extract the phrases and keywords from a document so that it can be summarized. When a human interacts with a computer, the key problem is that the computer does not understand what a person wants. To help us out in this situation, one can use the language understanding intelligent service. The tool can be directed to understand the information related to the question asked

Knowledge services

This is one of the most important services offered. Services like this one help you a lot in exploring relationships and entities among different searches such as journals, authors, review papers, and research papers. The service gives you recommendations on exploring more and more sites if you open one site. This gives you a lot of knowledge about a topic by taking you to multiple sites. For instance, if you use a customer’s viewing history for some kind of books or TV series then it is possible to recommend some more movies and shows in which you are interested

Search service

The search services play a role in enhancing and supplementing the present search services, this will be of massive help because you will easily find whatever you are looking for. The search service will help you to search the news articles and images related to the news that you are searching for. In addition to this, you will also find related video clips that are on the trending list. You can search for different things like books, movies, music, and articles. On every search, you would be given new recommendations, which will make things a bit easy for you

Do you need our innovative solutions? Get advice from our professionals.

Make A Request
Talk With Expert
